<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:D218_7</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>D218_7</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Developing reading skills in relation to the Social Sciences</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sich entwickelnde Lesefähigkeiten in Beziehung 
zu den Sozialwissenschaften</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Qualifications se développantes de lecture par 
rapport aux sciences sociales</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Habilidades tornando-se da leitura com relação 
às ciências sociais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abilità di sviluppo della lettura rispetto alle 
scienze sociali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανάπτυξη των δεξιοτήτων ανάγνωσης σε σχέση με τις 
κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Habilidades de la lectura que se convierten en lo 
referente a las ciencias sociales</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">Have you ever wondered what skills are needed to get the most out of reading social science materials? This unit looks at how reading skills are developed and provides three questions that should be kept in mind when working through Social Science texts and extracts.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Society</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Haben Sie überhaupt sich gewundert, welche 
Fähigkeiten erforderlich sind, die die meisten aus 
Lesesozialwissenschaft Materialien heraus zu erhalten? Diese 
Maßeinheit betrachtet, wie lesend Fähigkeiten entwickelt werden und 
liefert drei Fragen, die im Verstand beim Arbeiten gehalten werden 
sollten durch Sozialwissenschaft Texte und Extrakte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vous êtes-vous jamais demandé quelles 
qualifications sont nécessaires pour obtenir les la plupart hors des 
matériaux sociaux de la science de lecture ? Cette unité 
regarde la façon dont lisant des qualifications sont développées et
fournit trois questions qui devraient être maintenues dans l'esprit 
en travaillant par les textes et les extraits sociaux de la Science.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Você quis saber sempre que habilidades são 
needed começar o a maioria fora dos materiais sociais da ciência da 
leitura? Esta unidade olha como lendo as habilidades são 
desenvolvidas e fornece três perguntas que devem ser mantidas na 
mente ao trabalhar através dos textos e dos extratos sociais da 
ciência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vi siete domandati mai che abilità sono 
necessarie ottenere il la maggior parte dai materiali sociali di 
scienza della lettura? Questa unità guarda come leggendo le 
abilità sono sviluppate e fornisce tre domande che dovrebbero essere 
tenute presente quando funziona attraverso i testi e gli estratti 
sociali di scienza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έχετε αναρωτηθεί πάντα ποιες δεξιότητες απαιτούνται 
για να πάρουν οι περισσότερες από την ανάγνωση των υλικών 
κοινωνικών επιστημών; Αυτή η μονάδα εξετάζει το πώς οι 
δεξιότητες ανάγνωσης αναπτύσσονται και παρέχει τρεις ερωτήσεις 
που πρέπει να ληφθούν υπόψη κατά το εργασία μέσω των κειμένων 
και των αποσπασμάτων κοινωνικών επιστημών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Usted se ha preguntado siempre qué habilidades 
son necesarias conseguir el la mayoría de los materiales sociales de 
la ciencia de la lectura? Esta unidad mira cómo leen se 
desarrollan las habilidades y proporciona a tres preguntas que se 
deban tener presente al trabajar a través de los textos y de los 
extractos sociales de la ciencia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesellschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Société</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sociedade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Società</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sociedad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
